Translations.Text: Yi longzhao shi de heiye fashi
yi xianzhu shi de baizhou fashi
yi chuangzao nanxing he nuxing de zhu fashi
nimen de xingwei, que shi butong de
Zhiyu zhenji pinmin, jingwei an la
qie chengren zhi shan zhe
wo jiang shi ta yiyu dadao zui yi de jieju
Zhiyu linxi qiancai, zi wei wu qiu
qie fouren zhi shan zhe
wo jiang shi ta yiyu dadao zui nan de jieju
Dang ta lunwang de shihou, ta de caichan yu ta you she me biyi ne
Wo que you zhidao de zeren
wo que you houshi he jinshi de zhuquan
Guwo jinggao nimen yi zhong fa yan de huo
wei boming zhe zhui ru qizhong
ta fouren zhenli, er beiqi zhi
Jingwei zhe, de mian yu huoxing
Ta qiancheng de shishe ta de caichan
ta meiyou shouguo renhe ren de ying bao de ende
dan ta shishe zhishi weile qiu ta de zhigao zhu de zun rong
ta ziji jianglai biding xiyue
